product_name: BriogeoCurl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Leave-In Defining Creme
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackBriogeo's curl-defining Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Leave-In Defining Creme boosts hydration, minimizes frizz, and provides soft, flexible control for waves and curls.
details: DetailsBenefitsDefines curl pattern and minimizes frizzProvides soft, flexible controlClean and naturally derived, formulated 6-free, and made with Briogeo proprietary NOVA ComplexKey IngredientsRice Amino Acids: Seal the hair cuticle to lock out environmental moisture that can cause frizzAvocado Oil: Delivers lightweight moisture, softens curls, and enhances shineMollis Leaf Extract and Tomato Fruit Ferment: Seal the hair cuticle to ensure consistent curl formation and enhanced definitionQuinoa Extract: Nourishes and enhances the texture of curlsItem 2575494How To UseAfter washing and conditioning, apply one to two quarter-sized amounts evenly to damp hair from root to tip. Allow curls to air dry, or diffuse with a blow dryer.Precautions: Discontinue use if irritation occurs.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin,* Polyquaternium-37, Isopropyl Myristate,* Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil,* Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil,* Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract,* Hydrolyzed Quinoa,* Keratin Amino Acids,* Lactobacillus/Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract,* Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice,* Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Sorbitol,* Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil,* Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil,* Acyl Coenzyme A Desaturase,* Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein,* Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein,* Hydrolyzed Soy Protein,* PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Cetrimonium Chloride,* Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate,* Polyquaternium-10,* Sodium Hydroxide, PG-Hydroxyethylcellulose Cocodimonium Chloride,* Fragrance (Parfum), Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol.*Coconut, vegetable, or plant derived.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After washing and conditioning, apply one to two quarter-sized amounts evenly to damp hair from root to tip. Allow curls to air dry, or diffuse with a blow dryer.Precautions: Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

reviews.headline: love Briogeo but this is a miss
reviews.comments: I absolutely love most Briogio products, especially their masks and oils. however, this curl cream, which I was super excited to try, was a miss for me. it is thick and heavy and gave me no definition but rather weighed my hair down even using a small amount. I tried a few different times with various products and it just didn't work for me. sadly, I returned it.

reviews.headline: Great for dry weather
reviews.comments: Ive used this product in dry weather locations like colorado and cali and it works amazingly in both places

reviews.headline: I just bought it again !
reviews.comments:
Great product to use between shampoos. 
Allows the damp hair become curly.

reviews.headline: Cr√®me
reviews.comments: I like the gel better - this makes my hair feel greasy, but it does work and it looks good!

reviews.headline: Could do better
reviews.comments: Not a fan at all. It didnt clump curls nicely it came out frizzy and stringy.

reviews.headline: Crunchy
reviews.comments: Crunchy wet look, not what I was going for.  My hair wasn't even curly after using this, just crunchy and stringy and it looked wet. GROSS!

reviews.headline: Made my hair feel dirty
reviews.comments: Did not like how this made my hair feel. It felt dirty like there was a film on it. I only bought it because the store didnt have the Kenra curl defining creme in stock. Will be going back to that product and returning this one

reviews.headline: Keeps Hair Soft
reviews.comments: I have permed hair and I use this after shampooing hair and it makes my hair so soft!

reviews.headline: Stop the gatekeeping!
reviews.comments:
My 15 year old biracial son uses this product and has the most beautiful luscious coils. He is always being asked what he uses and refuses to tell anyone. 
I am here to out him. If you live near the capital of the hoa hoa hoa foggy green region of the US and asked a boy with beautiful curls what he uses, this is it.

reviews.headline: It does make my hair curly but I cocktail it with a gel .
reviews.comments: It's almost perfect as I like the smell and texture of the product but I do have to mix it with a gel to give it more oomph so my hair has wave and isn't naturally curly.

reviews.headline: Really like this product
reviews.comments: Love that this product isn't too heavy, not sticky and doesnt leave my curls crunchy like gel would. Defines my curls nicely

reviews.headline: Best for my porous wavy frizzy hair
reviews.comments: Best thing for my wavey porous hair

reviews.headline: Thank you Briogeo üò≠üôèüèª
reviews.comments:
I genuinely don't even know where to start! This curl cream has become my holy Grail and staple in my styling routine. I have 3c curls, low density, low porosity, and fine hair strands.... Imagine how easy it is for my hair to be weighed down!! I've struggled my entire life finding products that work for me because the products that are thin enough on the market are for straight+wavy hair and the products on the market for curly hair were too thick and heavy. Discovering Briogeo, Ouidad, Innersense, and Redken has been where I've had luck. This curl cream is also a leave in cream which is perfect because when I was using a leave in cream on top of my styling products, it always weighed my hair down no matter what I did (trust me, I always water down everything I put in my hair). This curl cream has such a nice slip to it that makes applying it to my hair very nice and smooth! I love the scent as well. Having this in my curl styling routine, my hair can last me about 4-5 days if I really worked for it but Im very particular about my scalp health so I wash my hair every 3 days or so(: the cream itself doesn't leave a cast on my hair, the cast I'm referring to in the pics is from Ouidad's defining mousse which I apply AFTER this cream. I do this because since the conditioning product is this cream, I like doing it first so my hair has a better chance of absorbing moisture and the protein agents of the product too. The product itself is a lightweight to medium weight one, but by watering it down before applying, it works perfectly for me. I love it! My product routine is as follows:

Shampoo: Redken curls acidic bonding 
Conditioner: Redken curls acidic bonding
Clarifying shampoo: Redken clarifying cream (1x/week)
Scalp cleanse: Briogeo scalp revival mask(1x/week)
Deep conditioner: rizos curls deep conditioner(1x/week)

Leave-in bonding treatment: Living Proof triple bond complex (2x-4x/week)
Styling cream: Briogeo defining leave in cream 
Styling mousse: Ouidad curl defining mousse or Innersense I create lift voluming foam
Styling gel: innersense I create volume gel (use when needed)
Oil: Odele Hair Oil (super lightweight!!)

reviews.headline: Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.comments: I've been looking for a non-toxic curl cream to replace Redken Frizz Dismiss cream, which ive been using for close to a decade. I tried a few products and finally found this and haven't looked back! It smells amazing and doesnt leave my hair feeling cakey or greasy like some products I tried did. I comb my wet hair, then use about two quarters worth of product and scrunch it in, then let it dry. I know some people complain it left their hair stringy and hard, but it softens up throughout the day and overnight, leaving my hair looking great natural. Would definitely recommend, especially for those looking to replace thd Redken cream or something similar!

reviews.headline: Great product, unfortunately can't use.
reviews.comments:
I have thick, coarse, low porosity, and long wavy hair. Around 2A. This product is the only cream besides Olaplex 6 I've tried that makes my hair look and feel pretty good. The unfortunate thing is I, for the life of me, can't take the smell. It's not even that strong, but I notice after a couple hours of having it on, I feel dizzy and have a headache. It's happened every time I put this on. I wish I didn't have such a sensitive nose, but not much I can do about that. 

If you're not sensitive to fragrance, this cream will probably work great for you.

reviews.headline: Excellent Product
reviews.comments: I have fine wavy/ curly hair and have searched for years for a light weight product with decent hold. This does it. And I love the values this brand stands for.

reviews.headline: good
reviews.comments: good for curls

reviews.headline: Leaves hair dry
reviews.comments: I have type 3B curls and my hair is thick. This left my hair feeling dry and didn't help with frizz.

reviews.headline: Amazing light curl cream
reviews.comments: I use it daily and also right afer i wash my hair and it is amazing. I suggest either wetting your hair and scrunching it to the strands it will give s soft define curl that looks snd feels exceptional!!

reviews.headline: Crunchy
reviews.comments: This didn't work for my hair. It left a crunchy texture, and my hair wasn't as soft after using, as other leave-in products.

faceoff_positive.headline: Thank you Briogeo üò≠üôèüèª

faceoff_negative.comments: After looking and looking for curl products I really wanted something clean after leaving Deva Curl (which I still love). I fell in love with this line's ingredients and currently use Briogeo curly charisma co-wash and I love it so far. However, this curl cream is no bueno! I have fine/medium 2b-3a curl patterns. When I put it in it felt good and smelled nice and clean. I leave my hair to air dry always. It felt great putting in the hair, not too thin or too thick. But I noticed immediately my curls looked too tight, and as it was drying there was a crunchy feeling to it. After it finally dried, the crunch went away, but my hair looked frizzy, weighed down, and had no define for my curls at all. The curls, on the top of my head, were very tight and the rest of my hair was stringy. My curl pattern was gone. In the morning, my hair was a tangled mess. I Will be returning and trying a new product until I find the right one- I guess.
faceoff_negative.headline: Sucky

rollup.name: Curl Charisma Rice Amino + Avocado Leave-In Defining Creme
